A majestic fantasy castle, adorned with soaring spires intricately carved from weathered stone, stands against a breathtaking backdrop of a moonlit night.  Twinkling stars illuminate the surrounding landscape, casting long shadows as a veil of ethereal mist blankets a tranquil lake that laps gently at the castle's base. The scene evokes an aura of ancient magic and whispered legends, inviting viewers to unravel its mysteries.
